OUTPUTDEVICE_DESC: This is the "raw" output name that you have selected in Volumio. You need to select the same device in Roon in order for the metadata and album art to be displayed in Volumio.
CORE_ZONE_DESC: This is the friendly name you have given your selected audio device in Roon. This may show as 'Not Detected' if you haven't authorized the extension in your Roon settings and/or activated a zone in Roon that uses a device connected to Volumio.
CORE_HOST_DESC: IP address and port of your paired Roon Core. This is mostly informative, and is the address used for album art. If this isn't detected then you will only see track info with no album art. This may show as 'Not Detected' if you haven't authorized the extension in your Roon settings and/or activated a zone in Roon that uses a device connected to Volumio.
CORE_NAME_DESC: The name of your paired Roon Core. It should be familiar. This may show as 'Not Detected' if you haven't authorized the extension in your Roon settings and/or activated a zone in Roon that uses a device connected to Volumio.
HOWTO_DESC: Before you begin, make sure your have authorized the plugin in your Roon Settings -> Extensions. Then, your Roon playback zone/device and the one you have selected in Volumio need to match in order for the metadata functions of this plugin to work. Use the Roon Vitals below to help you select the correct zone/device.
